Job Description: Job Description    Carries out engineering assignments of limited scope and complexity.    Under the general direction of a senior engineer, is responsible for a project or part of a project or operation requiring a thorough knowledge of engineering and related fields.    Typically has a Bachelors Degree in Engineering, with 3 to 8 years work experience inn C# core programming skills, in addition with hands on experience in WPF and/or WCF.    Additional tasks may involve generate SW design documents using Code, perform SW Design tests Source code verification etc.      Skills Experience   C#, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)
